item.title: MIUI V13.0.1.0.SJETWXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 9T Taiwan

New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 9T Taiwan

Codename: cannong

Version: V13.0.1.0.SJETWXM | 12.0

Changelog:

item.title: MIUI V13.0.1.0.SJETWXM Recovery update for Redmi Note 9T Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi Note 9T Taiwan

Codename: cannong

Version: V13.0.1.0.SJETWXM | 12.0

Size: 3.0 GB

MD5: 3e86753946c7f0ed70d8d64760d968a8

Changelog:
[MIUI 13]
New: A new widget ecosystem with app support
Optimization: Improved overall stability
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
Updated Android Security Patch to July 2022. Increased system security.
[More features and improvements]
Optimization: Enhanced accessibility support for Phone, Clock, and Weather
Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now

Download: Here
